text: Phillip James Elliot (October 8, 1927 â€“ January 8, 1956) was a Christian missionary to Ecuador, where he was killed by Huaorani Indians. ==Quotes== "He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain what he cannot lose." (an entry in Jim Elliot's journal) "Wherever you are, be all there. Live to the hilt every situation you believe to be the will of God." Category:1927 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Christian missionaries Category:American Christians Category:American people murdered abroad
title: Jim Elliot
